text: @realDonaldTrump Stock market tanking, not prepared for Coronavirus outbreak, cutting funding for disease protection, attacking Supreme Court Judges...and its only Tuesday. Why did State Department overrule the CDC recommendation to keep the infected citizens quarantined abroad?
